publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6129.1 Derek Brownlee: Economic Recovery Planâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6129) in the name of John Swinney, insert at end "; regrets the decision of the UK Government to raise further the cost of employment with the proposed increase in national insurance; believes that job creation in Scotland depends on a growing private sector; calls on the Scottish Government to work with the UK Government to rebalance the Scottish economy to make it less dependent on the public sector and to provide opportunities for new business creation, business growth and new jobs, and further calls on the Scottish Government to bring back to the Parliament more details on how it intends to rebalance the Scottish economy and assist growth in the private sector."
